thread.title: Kim Kardashian unveils platinum blonde bob as she celebrates Paris Hilton's 36th birthday
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian unveils platinum blonde bob as she celebrates Paris Hilton's 36th birthday

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kim Kardashian unveils platinum blonde bob as she celebrates Paris Hilton's 36th birthday
text:
Kim Kardashian unveils platinum blonde bob as she celebrates Paris Hilton's 36th birthday The reality star spent Friday night partying with childhood pal Paris Share Kim Kardashian shows off her new look (Photo: Kim Kardashian/Snapchat) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It looks like Kim Kardashian thinks blondes really do have more fun. 
A day after sharing a new batch of sexy bikini-clad Costa Rica photos, the reality star unveiled her new platinum blonde bob on Friday. 
Taking to Snapchat, the mum-of-two proudly showed off the bright hue to her millions of followers. 
Alongside one video, she gave a shout out to childhood friend Paris Hilton who turned 36 on Friday. 
“Happy Birthday Paris Hilton,” Kim, also 36, shared. Kim Kardashian (Photo: Kim Kardashian/Snapchat) Kim Kardashian (Photo: Kim Kardashian/Snapchat) Kim Kardashian (Photo: Kim Kardashian/Snapchat) Read More Kim Kardashian displays voluptuous rear in tiny white thong in more jaw-dropping shots from Costa Rica trip 
And she later tweeted: “Today's vibes channeling Paris! Happy Birthday @ParisHilton Can't wait to celebrate with you soon!" 
In a separate snap, curvaceous Kim is also showing off her full outfit, which is made up of a cleavage baring tiny black bralet, form-fitting black skirt and glistening choker. Kim Kardashian (Photo: Kim Kardashian/Snapchat) Read More Kim Kardashian wants to return to Paris for Fashion Week five months after being robbed at gunpoint 
Kim's mum Kris Jenner also sent some social media love to Paris on her birthday. 
Alongside a snap taken on her 21st birthday, the momager wrote: "Happy Birthday Paris!!! I have known you since you were born and you have grown up to be an amazing young lady... 
"Smart, kind, beautiful inside and out and always thinking of others..this is 15 years ago at studio 54 for your 21st birthday!!!! 
"Always so much fun when we are all together.... love you "
